mapper.select: select * from (select e.*, rownum rnum from (select * from event order by eve_num desc)e) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow} and to_date(eve_start,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(eve_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select nvl(count(*), 0) from event_entry where eve_num = #{num}
